A side USB port provides convenient charging access using your own power bank (not included), and smooth in-line skate wheels ensure effortless rolling. The fully lined interior with accessory pockets and an exterior quick-access pocket keeps essentials organized and within reach. Please review the size guide before travel.

name: Travelpro Crew Classic Lightweight Softside Luggage, Underseat Travel Tote Bag, Men and Women, Black
short_description: Travel tote has soft construction that accommodates stowage under most airline seats and other tight spaces. High-density fabric with DuraGuard coating provides ultimate stain- and abrasion resistance

Underseat bag has an interior rear accessory pocket keeps important items stored and easy to find. ECOFAB interior lining with H2O guard is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles (7.5 total bottles) to help reduce environmental waste.
Tote bag has two exterior front pockets that provide quick access to essentials. YKK zippers ensure alignment, smooth operation, and extreme durability.

Undereseat bag has removable, adjustable shoulder strap that offers hands-free carrying. Rear strap fits around the extension handle of a Rollaboard or spinner suitcase for secure stacking and hands-free mobility.

Case Dimensions: 10 in x 16.25 in x 9 in, Overall Dimensions: 10 in x 16.25 in x 9 in, Weight: 1.6 lbs, Volume: 25 L. Limited Lifetime Coverage plus trusted companion promise, which covers the cost of repair for damage from airline or other common carrier for the first 3 years owned by the original purchaser or gift recipient. Applicable when purchased as new and after registration.
product_description: Travelpro is the brand of choice carried by crews from more than 90 worldwide airlines. Our extensive insider knowledge of the functionality and resilience needed by today’s aviation professionals provided inspiration when designing the new Crew Classic assortment specifically for the passenger who appreciates organized packing. Traveling well means traveling prepared. The Crew Classic UnderSeat Tote is a durable personal-item-sized carry on that puts all your onboard essentials right at your feet. Softsided and sized to fit under most airline seats or other tight spaces, this travel tote is made from highly resilient fabric, coated to resist stains and abrasions. Plus, its ECOFAB lining is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles to reduce environmental waste. Two exterior front pockets provide quick access to essentials, and an interior rear accessory pocket keeps smaller items easy to find. Carry this tote using the grab handles and removable shoulder strap or use the rear strap to securely stack this tote on your Rollaboard® or spinner. Backed by a Built For a Lifetime Limited Warranty with our 3 Year Trusted Companion Promise, which covers damage caused by an airline or other common carrier.
